ARGUMENT
b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hsmexlem7.h | |- H = ( rec ( ( z e. _V |-> ( har ` ~P ( X X. z ) ) ) , ( har ` ~P X ) ) |` _om ) |
| 2 |  | #P_nn0suc | |- ( a e. _om -> ( a = (/) \/ E. b e. _om a = suc b ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( a = (/) -> ( H ` a ) = ( H ` (/) ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_hsmexlem7 | |- ( H ` (/) ) = ( har ` ~P X ) |
| 5 |  | #P_harcl | |- ( har ` ~P X ) e. On |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- ( H ` (/) ) e. On |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( a = (/) -> ( H ` a ) e. On ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_hsmexlem8 | |- ( b e. _om -> ( H ` suc b ) = ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` b ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_harcl | |- ( har ` ~P ( X X. ( H ` b ) ) ) e. On |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( b e. _om -> ( H ` suc b ) e. On ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( a = suc b -> ( H ` a ) = ( H ` suc b ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( a = suc b -> ( ( H ` a ) e. On <-> ( H ` suc b ) e. On ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( b e. _om -> ( a = suc b -> ( H ` a ) e. On ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_rexlimiv | |- ( E. b e. _om a = suc b -> ( H ` a ) e. On ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_jaoi | |- ( ( a = (/) \/ E. b e. _om a = suc b ) -> ( H ` a ) e. On ) |
| 16 | 2, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( a e. _om -> ( H ` a ) e. On ) |
